flawed_nl_solution:
The salesman sold 17 bags for 17 bags x $18/bag = $<<17*18=306>>306
He sold 10 more for 10 bags x $25/bag = $<<10*25=250>>250
Thus far he has sold 17 bags + 10 bags = <<17+10=27>>27 bags
Therefore he sold 48 bags - 27 bags = <<48-27=18>>18 bags for $22 each
18 bags were sold for 18 bags x $22/bag = $<<18*22=396>>396
In total the salesman made $306 + $250 + $396 = $<<306+250+396=952>>952
The salesman made $952 - $576 = $<<952-576=376>>376 in profit.

error_details.explanation: The result of this computation should be 21, not 18. This appears to be a minor miscalculation.
